title: Bichon Frise
description: The Bichon Frise has a white, fluffy coat and endearing smile that wins over hearts.

title: Boston Terrier
description: The Boston Terrier is a traditional American dog known for its signature dark-colored and white coat complemented by large sparkling eyes.

title: Shih Tzu
description: The Shih Tzu has a tiny face and bright eyes that have charmed people for generations—and continue to do so.

title: Chihuahua
description: One of the tiniest dog breeds under 10 pounds, the Chihuahua is known for its small size but large personality—not to mention pointy ears and cute round eyes.

title: Dachshund
description: The Dachshund is an unmistakable breed that comes in miniature and standard sizes and a multitude of colors. They are extremely good looking and amusing dogs.

title: Toy Poodle
description: While the Poodle is often associated with dog shows, these curly-coated, muscular dogs are also great companions to welcome into your home. However, they are not exclusively in the small dog breed category; the small versions of this breed include Toy and Miniature Poodles.
